title: Bone Glove
summaries: The Bone Glove is an accessory that throws ricocheting crossbones every time a weapon is used, at a maximum of once per second. The crossbones projectiles ricochet off walls three times or pierce two enemies before being destroyed, deal 25 classless damage, and additionally have 25 armor penetration. The Bone Glove is always dropped from Skeletron's Treasure Bag in Expert Mode.

statistics.Tooltip: Shoots crossbones at enemies while you are attacking
statistics.Sell: 2 GC
